edu.wheaton.simulator.statistics

Class EntitySnapshot

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wheaton.simulator.statistics.EntitySnapshot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentSnapshot, SlotSnapshot

    public abstract class EntitySnapshot
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing all the information to track from each Entity in the game.
    Author:
    Daniel Gill, Akon Ngoh

        id - The ID of the Entity associated with this snapshot.
